channel.title: NVIDIA Enhancing Upcoming Ubisoft PC Games

item.title: NVIDIA Enhancing Upcoming Ubisoft PC Games
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
Maxey:

Can’t wait for more unoptimized games.

I hope not, but… pretty much this.

Anyway HBAO is pretty good looking and stuff but it doesn’t “make the game” like good gameplay mechanics do for example. Which is why I’m playing watch dogs with textures as high as I can and almost all the fancy effects completely off.

Yes I said it, even at night time while it’s raining, Chicago still looks nice with ambient occlusion disabled.

Read full topic
item.source: NVIDIA Enhancing Upcoming Ubisoft PC Games

item.title: NVIDIA Enhancing Upcoming Ubisoft PC Games
item.dc:creator: Kairouseki
item.description:
Means jackshit if Ubisoft can’t make a good game that runs well anyway. And Physx is kind of gimmicky (as well as impossible to use for gameplay because of how it’s Nvidia only) and TXAA is pretty bad. Their HBAO+ is pretty cool though. I would prefer this split between AMD and Nvidia to stop but I don’t think it will anytime soon.

Read full topic
item.source: NVIDIA Enhancing Upcoming Ubisoft PC Games

item.title: NVIDIA Enhancing Upcoming Ubisoft PC Games

item.description:
To be fair, most of nvidia’s stuff works just fine, Ubisoft are just really shitty at doing PC ports.
